name: VCX-100 Light Freighter
ability: Tail Gun: While you have a docked ship, you have a primary [Rear] weapon with an attack value equal to your docker ship's primary [Front] attack value.

pilots.name: Hera Syndulla
pilots.caption: Spectre-2
pilots.ability: After you reveal a red or blue maneuver, you may set your dial to another maneuver of the same difficulty.

pilots.name: Lothal Rebel
pilots.text: Another successful Corellion Engineering Corporation freighter design, the VCX-100 is larger than the ubiquitous YT-series, boasting more living space and customizability.
